NAME: Master Swordsmith

NAME: Millhouse Manastorm

NAME: Mogushan Warden
TEXT: Taunt

NAME: Moonfire
TEXT: Deal 2 damage.

FLAVOR: If you only use one ability use Mortal Strike. - The Warrior Code Line 6

NAME: Mountain Giant

NAME: Nozdormu

NAME: Onyxia
TEXT: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.

TEXT: Increased stats.

NAME: Power Overwhelming

NAME: Power Overwhelming
TEXT: This minion has +4/+4 but will die a horrible death at the end of the turn.

NAME: Preparation

TEXT: Health reduced to 1.
